short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: TalkGuidance is a screen reader powered by GPT, which designed to make web browsing more accessible for visually impaired users.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Introducing TalkGuidance GPT: A Revolutionary Screen Reader for the Visually Impaired

TalkGuidance GPT is a Chrome extension designed to enhance web accessibility for visually impaired users by employing GPT technology. This cutting-edge solution intelligently analyzes website elements and delivers detailed information about them as users navigate using the Tab key. By offering a more inclusive browsing experience, TalkGuidance GPT empowers blind users to better comprehend the purpose and function of various website components.

This screen reader is ideal for visually impaired users seeking an innovative, easy-to-use solution for their web browsing needs. In addition, it may be useful for web developers and designers looking to test their site's accessibility features.

TalkGuidance GPT offers a range of features, including GPT-powered analysis of DOM elements, customizable language settings, adjustable speech rate, an easy-to-use interface, and no data collection. It is free to use, and voice control functionality is coming soon!

To get started, simply download the TalkGuidance GPT Chrome extension from the Chrome Web Store and follow the installation instructions. Once installed, configure the language, rate, and API key in the extension popup. If you don't have a GPT API key, you can easily sign up for one on OpenAI's website.

With TalkGuidance GPT installed and configured, you can effortlessly navigate web pages using the Tab key. As you focus on different elements, the extension will analyze the DOM and provide clear, concise descriptions to help you understand the element's purpose. Please note that TalkGuidance GPT is not intended for e-commerce use.

Currently, TalkGuidance GPT supports numerous languages(including cantonese), with more being added regularly. We encourage users to share their feedback and suggestions to help us continually improve the extension. If you have any questions or need assistance, feel free to contact us at xff9924@gmail.com.

Experience a more accessible web with TalkGuidance GPT! Happy browsing! üåç
